title: 10 Simple Steps To Upgrade Your Style | Easy Fashion Hacks To Improve Outfit

json.text: Ten simple style steps that you can take today to upgrade your wardrobe and your look so
that you become the best-dressed you really quick.

Purge your closet.

Now, there may be some items you're unsure about.
It's like, Antonio, man I spent a lot of money I like this, I don't wear it very often, but
I want to keep it, I just know someday I'll use it.
Okay.
Put those items in a box, put a date on that box.
Put it in the back of your closet and if you need you can break into it.
But, if you haven't broken into that box for year, donate it.
The point is I want to have and you need to have a better picture of your closet and the
only way to dot that is to get rid of items which are simply cluttering up space and preventing

In addition, when you wear nice shoes, polish them before you put the back away.
Why?
So, that when you're in a hurry, you put on polished shoes versus having to say, oh, I

And then, you skip it and you just don't dress well, so learn to take care of your clothing

Tip number nine.
